CodeEditorModel.Text:
'Code behind Page - Add local subroutines for the page.
Sub Test1
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _RetourTest1 AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _RetourTest1
Call S_PopUp.MsgBox("Salut, une action sera faite si tu appuie sur 'Yes'", "Titre", S_Popup.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Start wake up function ''' </summary> ''' <param name="button"></param> Private Sub _RetourTest1(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _RetourTest1
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then Call S_PopUp.MsgBox("Il a appui√© sur YES") End If
End Sub
Sub Test2
Call S_PopUp.MsgBox("Test avec une image dynamique !", "Mon titre", S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Question, "THE_FA_USB_1")
End Sub
Sub Test3
Call S_PopUp.MsgBox("Mon texte", "mon titre", S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Question)
End Sub
Sub OnShow
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _Reponse AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _Reponse
End Sub
Private Sub _Reponse(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
Me.Label0.Text = _HMI_Second.ToString
End Sub
